name: tmall.trend.style.basicinfo.upload
description: 3D款式基本信息同步至天猫趋势中心

requestParams.name: style_basic_info_bo_list
requestParams.description: 款式基本信息列表，单次同步最多1000条

subParams.name: sync_purpose
subParams.description: 款式同步目的，枚举，INSERT("新增"), UPDATE("更新"), OFFLINE("下线");

subParams.name: offline_reason
subParams.description: 款式下线原因，枚举，当上面同步目的字段为DELETE时此参数必传，IP_COPYRIGHT("版权原因"), DESIGN_FLAW("设计缺陷"), OTHER("其他原因");

subParams.name: copyright_owner
subParams.description: 版权归属方，集团安全约束，此参数必填

subParams.name: pattern
subParams.description: 图案元素，多个用英文分号分割组成字符串传递

subParams.name: craftsmanship
subParams.description: 工艺技法，多个用英文分号分割

subParams.name: major_material_cate
subParams.description: 主料类别，枚举，KNITTING("针织"), WOVEN("梭织"), WOOLEN("毛织"), NON_WOVEN_FABRIC("牛仔"), LEATHER("皮草")

subParams.name: style_type
subParams.description: 风格类型，枚举，YOUNG_LADY_CLOTHING("少淑女装"), JIAN_OU_ZHONG_SHU("简欧中淑"), MATURE_AND_ELEGANT("成熟优雅"), COTTON_LINEN_STYLE("棉麻风"), STREET_FASHION("棉麻风"), GUO_CHAO("国朝"), BUSINESS_CASUAL("商务休闲"), FASHION_FUNCTION("时尚机能"), SPORTS_AND_LEISURE("运动休闲"), OUTDOOR_SPORTS("运动休闲"), JAPANESE_AND_KOREAN_STYLE("日韩风格"), COLLEGE_STYLE("学院风"), CHINESE_STYLE("中国风"), FOLK_CUSTOM("民族风"), BOHEMIA_STYLE("波西米亚"), MIDDLE_EASTERN_STYLE("中东风"), WORKPIECE_STYLE("工装风");

subParams.name: detail_pic_source_url
subParams.description: 款式细节图，多个链接地址用英文分号分割，最多10张细节图

subParams.name: authorize_proof_source_url
subParams.description: 授权证明，图片链接，当版权方不是凌迪时

subParams.name: crowed_type
subParams.description: 偏好人群，枚举，LUXURIOUS_CROWED("奢华人群"), FASHION_CROWED("奢华人群"), MAIN_STREAM_FASHION_CROWED("主流时尚者"), QUALITY_PRAGMATIC_CROWED("品质实用者"), SHOPAHOLIC("购物狂"), ECONOMICAL_PRAGMATIC_CROWED("平价实惠者")

subParams.name: decoration_detail
subParams.description: 装饰细节，多个用英文分号分割

subParams.name: offline_reason_detail
subParams.description: 下线操作时说明详细下线原因

subParams.name: key_properties
subParams.description: 核心属性项，英文分号分割，最多3个，必须按照给定备选项设置，否则强校验会不通过

responseParams.name: value
responseParams.description: 款式基本信息同步处理结果描述

responseParams.name: resp_error_code
responseParams.description: 错误码,1001-系统错误，1002-请求参数错误，1003-业务处理错误，1004-数据权限错误
